title: Opinion: Biden should have handled the relationship with the Saudis better from the start
description: After being offline for 25 hours observing Yom Kippur, I opened my phone, and the news reports flooded in. The most compelling story was OPEC+'s decision to reduce oil production significantly, which understandably caused much consternation in Washington.

title: Analysis: Putin is likely to take Kerch bridge blast as a personal affront and respond viciously
Analysis: Putin is likely to take Kerch bridge blast as a personal affront and respond viciously
Senator says Biden needs to reevaluate relations with Saudi Arabia
description: Sen. Chris Murphy (D-CT) discusses the US relationship and dealings with Saudi Arabia after the Saudis sided with Russia and OPEC in restricting the number of oil barrels produced by the organization.

title: Liverpool suffers defeat to Arsenal as Merseysiders' terrible start to season continues
description: It may just only be October, but it seems as if Liverpool's English Premier League title challenge could be all but over even before Halloween after Jurgen Klopp's men suffered a 3-2 defeat to Arsenal on Sunday.

title: Alabama senator under fire for racially charged comments at Trump rally
description: Senator Tommy Tuberville (R-AL) addressed crime and reparations while speaking at a rally held by former President Trump in Minden, Nevada. CNN's Jake Tapper and the State of the Union panel discuss the senator's racially charged comments.

title: Putin will hold the meeting on Monday, just two days after a massive explosion on a key strategic bridge linking Crimea and Russia
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin will hold an operational meeting of his Security Council on Monday, just two days after a massive explosion on a key strategic bridge linking Crimea and Russia.

title: Aaron Rodgers makes long-awaited London debut as Green Bay Packers lose to New York Giants
description: A person wearing a cheese wedge on their head might seem odd to most, but when the Green Bay Packers are in town it's just part and parcel of game day.

title: Texas District Attorney names San Antonio officer who shot 17-year-old in a McDonald's parking lot
description: • Video: Teen shot by police officer while eating in McDonald's parking lot

title: Former Gov. Bill Richardson suggests Brittney Griner and Paul Whelan may be released by end of year
description: Former Gov. Bill Richardson said Sunday he is "cautiously optimistic" that two Americans wrongfully detained by Russia will be released and suggested they could be freed by the end of the year.

title: Russia attacks city in region Putin claimed to have annexed
Why many Floridians living in Ian's path can't count on insurance
description:
• Opinion: Why Ian killed so many people
• DeSantis and Biden's joint appearance has shifted Florida's governor race

title: Watch the moment hackers took over Iran's state broadcaster
description: Iran's state broadcaster IRINN (Islamic Republic of Iran News Network) was allegedly hacked during its nightly news program, according to the pro-reform IranWire outlet, which shared a clip of the hacking. CNN reporter Nada Bashir has more.

title: Opinion: Biden's extraordinary comment
description: "Can you tell me where we're headin'?" Bob Dylan asks in his 1978 song "Señor."

title: The Tucci family's must-have snack
description: For the Tucci family, a feast is not complete without one Italian staple. Zeppole are deep-fried doughnuts that Stanley Tucci calls "addictively delicious."

title: Erling Haaland shatters another Premier League record
Want to work 4 days a week? These business leaders are taking the leap
description: The pandemic has turbocharged the search for new ways of working. These companies are taking the lead in testing out a four-day work week and their experience might surprise you.

title: Tucci samples sausage in crème brûlée
description: While in Calabria, Stanley Tucci tried nduja, a spicy Italian sausage, in crème brûlée. All-new episodes of "Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy" air Sundays at 9 p.m. ET on CNN.

title: Two NFL teams with winning records to meet in a London first
description: American football is back in London for the second week in a row.

title: Max Verstappen crowned world champion after chaotic Japanese Grand Prix
description: Max Verstappen was crowned Formula One world champion in bizarre circumstances following a dominant victory at the Japanese Grand Prix on Sunday.

title: Extinction Rebellion activists glue themselves to Picasso painting
description: Two climate activists with Extinction Rebellion were arrested Sunday after gluing themselves to a Picasso painting at the National Gallery of Victoria in Melbourne.

title: 'SNL' recap: Brendan Gleeson hosts, high school seniors, Disney's new Ariel
description: Watch some of Brendan Gleeson's best moments from "Saturday Night Live." Including an appearance from Collin Farrell, a "Please Don't Destroy" short and an appearance from the new Ariel.

title: North Korea fires two ballistic missiles, South Korea and Japan say
Hurricane Julia makes landfall in Nicaragua as a Category 1 storm
description: Hurricane Julia made landfall in Nicaragua early Sunday as a Category 1 storm, the National Hurricane Center said.

title: Russian draft dodgers pour into Kazakhstan to escape Putin's war
description: Vadim says he plunged into depression last month after Russian President Vladimir Putin announced a military draft to send hundreds of thousands of conscripts to fight in Ukraine.

title: Five Hong Kong teenagers sentenced in first security case involving minors
description: Five teenagers with a Hong Kong group advocating independence from Chinese rule were ordered by a judge on Saturday to serve up to three years in detention at a correctional facility, for urging an "armed revolution" in a national security case.

title: Iran's state broadcaster hacked during nightly news program
description: An Iranian state broadcaster was allegedly hacked during its nightly news program Saturday, according to the pro-reform IranWire outlet, which shared a clip of the incident.

title: Satellite images show aftermath of Crimea bridge explosion
Ex-DC Metropolitan police officer details what GOP leaders said to him after insurrection
description: In his new book, "Hold the Line," former DC Metropolitan Police Officer Michael Fanone details his conversations with GOP leaders after the insurrection at the US Capitol. He joins CNN's Don Lemon to discuss.

title: Instagram restricts Kanye West's account
description: After being suspended by Meta on Friday, Kanye West posted on Twitter for the first time in nearly two years -- a move celebrated by Elon Musk, who is in the process of buying the social media network.

title: Violent weekend as four Palestinians killed in West Bank, three Israelis injured in Jerusalem shooting
description: Three Israelis were wounded, one critically, during a shooting at a checkpoint in North Jerusalem on Saturday, Israeli police said on Twitter.

title: Live: Satellite images show aftermath of Crimea bridge explosion
